programme.title: Christmas with the Singhs
programme.desc: Newly engaged Asha Singh and Jake O'Brien are excited to spend Christmas together, but their relationship is tested when their families' cultural and holiday traditions clash.

programme.desc: Dorothy and Rose agree to baby-sit a group of children, but one set of parents fails to claim its child.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia's acerbic sister, whom she hasn't seen or talked to in 30 years, pays an unexpected visit.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Following his major surgery, Dorothy allows her ex-husband, Stan, to recuperate from it in her bedroom.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: The roommates swoon over a TV actor Patrick Vaughn who is appearing at their community theater.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose becomes convinced she is dead after suffering an esophageal spasm; after this experience she decides to live for the day.

programme.desc: Brock lies to Kyra when she asks him about his past drug use; Cheyenne makes a confession to Van about her own brush with drugs.

programme.desc: A counselor encourages all to share their feelings during a workshop; Reba packs Kyra's things to send to Brock's house.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba convinces Barbra Jean her house is haunted by the previous owner, but the joke wears thin when Barbra Jean moves in with her.

programme.desc: Kyra and Barbra Jean hide a stray cat in the attic since Brock is allergic; Reba and Brock ply Jake with outrageous gifts.

programme.desc: Bebe (Harriet Harris), Frasier's agent, insists that he stage a sickout while she negotiates his contract.

programme.desc: Niles and Frasier drive off the employees of their new restaurant.

programme.desc: A power outage doesn't make Roz's evening any brighter when she helps celebrate Martin's birthday.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The new station manager, Kate Costas (Mercedes Ruehl), orders Frasier to make major changes in his show.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Norm paints Rebecca's office and apartment to pay off his overextended bar tab.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Cliff (John Ratzenberger) handcuffs himself to his mother's (Frances Sternhagen) house in an effort to save it from demolition.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Van and Cheyenne go out of town for Van's football game, Reba is upset to find they have asked Barbra Jean to take care of Elizabeth.

programme.desc: Van insists on coaching Reba after she agrees to compete against Brock in a 5K race to raise money for Jake's school.

programme.desc: Van announces he is quitting school to try out for arena football, but Reba's disapproval causes him to blow his chance.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Over Brock and Barbra Jean's objections, Reba gives Kyra permission to go on her first date, then discovers the boy is 17 years old.

programme.title: Love Takes Flight
programme.desc: A workaholic hospital director is forced to re-examine her rigid lifestyle when a free-wheeling EMS pilot enters her life.

programme.title: Sweet Autumn
programme.desc: Aunt Dee splits her candy shop between her niece Maggie and maple farmer Dex. Following letters Dee left, the two uncover the reason for her decision during the Sweet Autumn festival.

programme.title: A Dash of Love
programme.desc: When an aspiring chef lands a dream job at her idol's restaurant, she befriends the handsome executive chef. After they are wrongly fired, the duo open their own eatery to prove their food is better.

programme.title: Love in the Forecast
programme.desc: An aspiring meteorologist befriends a neighbor who teaches her the importance of trusting nature and each other.

programme.title: Romance in the Air
programme.desc: A woman gets a chance at happiness when she returns home and reunites with a childhood friend.

programme.title: Hearts Down Under
programme.desc: A New York restaurant owner inherits a charming cafe in Lemon Myrtle Cove, Australia, where she starts to fall for the cafe's charismatic chef.

programme.desc: When after school programs see their funding cut, teachers Josh and Ella turn to fundraising before banding together in search of a larger donation, falling hard along the way.

programme.desc: Jenna plans a charity event for Billionaire Tom Redlands. But working with Tom's right hand Andrew is proving difficult, especially since Jenna and Andrew have a romantic history.

programme.desc: The roommates reminisce about the adventures they have shared.

programme.desc: Cheyenne is upset when Van decides to shave his head for the team; Barbra Jean convinces Reba to go into business with her.

programme.desc: Taylor opens a time capsule left by her late mother on her birthday. It contains a list of challenges that force her out of her comfort zone, giving her a chance at the possibility of love.

programme.title: Right in Front of Me
programme.desc: A woman gets a second chance at romance with her college crush but isn't sure how to impress him until her new male friend gives her advice.
